text: ostasis 90% Abnormality of the nervous system 90% Anemia 90% Ataxia - Autosomal recessive inheritance - Chronic metabolic acidosis - Dysarthria - Glutathione synthetase deficiency - Hemolytic anemia - Intellectual disability - Intention tremor - Neutropenia - Pigmentary retinopathy - Psychotic mentation - Seizures - Spastic tetraparesis - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition. Much of this information comes from Orphanet
